abstract: Jean II Makoun (French pronunciation: ​[ʒɑ̃ dø mɑkun]) (born 29 May 1983) is a Cameroonian footballer who plays for Stade Rennais as a central midfielder. He also plays for the Cameroon national football team.
comment: Jean II Makoun (French pronunciation: ​[ʒɑ̃ dø mɑkun]) (born 29 May 1983) is a Cameroonian footballer who plays for Stade Rennais as a central midfielder. He also plays for the Cameroon national football team.
